question_text:
Question 56
A functional dependency 
:
F X
Y

 is termed as a useful function dependency if and only if it satisfies 
all the following three conditions :
•  
X
 is not the empty set.
• 
Y 
is not the empty set
• 
Intersection of 
X 
 and 
Y 
is the empty set
For a relation 
R
  with 4 attributes, the total number of possible useful functional dependencies is 
________.
[Database, 2 Database Design Functional]
   
Ans. 
(50 to 50)
